name: Saw & Sew
slogan: Mass market custom furniture done sustainably and made locally
description:
Saw & Sew officially launched during the 2019 London Design Week and was featured in the Evening Standard, Icon Design Guide and The World of Interiors.

We're already making cool chairs with well known artists and famed fashion houses.

Based on what we've learned,  we're developing a platform to host a community of enthusiasts, designers and producers that develop, share and sell furniture products and services based on the companyâ€™s proprietary designs and processes. 

We want to democracize furniture design and production so it's accessible to everyone and made-to-order locally.

jobs.title: PR / Social Media Intern
jobs.description:
Looking for someone to engage on social channels daily and contribute to marketing efforts including press releases.

If you're creative and highly motivated, we'll empower you to develop your skill set and support you with the materials needed. Our ideal candidate has an interest in home design and takes action. 

Any direct costs related to work will be covered. After a successful three month intern period, a paid position may be offered.
